recurringTasks.name: Morning Summary
recurringTasks.description: Automated notification summarizing overnight activity, queue status, and today's priorities.

recurringTasks.name: Auto-Pipeline Draft Generation
recurringTasks.description: Picks up captured ideas and generates drafts for all platforms using each philosopher's voice.

recurringTasks.name: Voice Quality Gate
recurringTasks.description: Diogenes checks all new drafts for voice consistency and flags anything that doesn't sound authentic.

recurringTasks.name: Peer Review Pipeline
recurringTasks.description: Socrates, Diogenes, and Hypatia review voice-checked drafts — probing questions, BS checks, and fact verification.

recurringTasks.name: Tension Daily Standup
recurringTasks.description: Tension reviews all agent workload, assigns tasks, flags problems, and directs the day's priorities.

recurringTasks.name: Repost Candidate Conversion
recurringTasks.description: Converts approved repost candidates into queue items for publishing.

recurringTasks.name: Comment Queue Scan
recurringTasks.description: Scans for commentable content across platforms, 3x daily.

recurringTasks.name: Engagement Target Scan
recurringTasks.description: Scans for engagement opportunities across platforms, 3x daily.

recurringTasks.name: Engagement Action Execution
recurringTasks.description: Executes queued engagement actions (replies, follows, likes), 3x daily.

recurringTasks.name: Queue Replenishment
recurringTasks.description: Auto-drafts new content for platforms running low on queued posts.

recurringTasks.name: Twitter Metrics Snapshot
recurringTasks.description: Captures daily Twitter engagement metrics for trend tracking.

recurringTasks.name: Evening Performance Recap
recurringTasks.description: End-of-day summary of what was posted, engagement received, and what's queued for tomorrow.

recurringTasks.name: Nightly Backup
recurringTasks.description: Automatic backup of all CMS data, queue state, and mission control database.

recurringTasks.name: Nightly Optimization
recurringTasks.description: Cleanup and optimization of data files, logs, and cache.

recurringTasks.name: Weekly Performance Report
recurringTasks.description: Comprehensive report on posts published, engagement, follower growth, agent productivity, and costs.

recurringTasks.name: Weekly Newsletter Generation
recurringTasks.description: Marcus drafts the weekly Substack newsletter from the week's top content, peer review highlights, and a practical exercise.

recurringTasks.name: Weekly Idea Batch Reset
recurringTasks.description: Resets idea pipeline batch tracking for the new week.

recurringTasks.name: Weekly Project Review
recurringTasks.description: Tension reviews the project roadmap, flags stale needs, and proposes new enhancements.

recurringTasks.name: Book Chapter Drafting
recurringTasks.description: Plato drafts the next book section, then Socrates, Hypatia, and Aristotle review it.

recurringTasks.name: Review & Publish Queued Content
recurringTasks.description: Review pending posts in the posting queue, edit if needed, and publish to each platform.

recurringTasks.name: Publish Newsletter to Substack
recurringTasks.description: Copy the generated newsletter from the posting queue into Substack, add cover image, and publish.

recurringTasks.name: Capture New Ideas
recurringTasks.description: Jot down new content ideas via Telegram, CMS Quick Capture, or conversation. Aim for 3-5 per day.

recurringTasks.name: Weekly Podcast Generation
recurringTasks.description: Full podcast pipeline: Tension selects topic, Plato writes script, agents review, Athena final edit, ElevenLabs generates audio. Queued for Shawn's approval.
